content: L'alfabeto dell'esperanto comprende ventotto lettere: a, b, c, ĉ, d, e, f, g, ĝ, h, ĥ, i, j, ĵ, k, l, m, n, o, p, r, s, ŝ, t, u, ŭ, v, z.
translations: eng:The Esperanto alphabet consists of 28 letters﹕ a, b, c, ĉ, d, e, f, g, ĝ, h, ĥ, i, j, ĵ, k, l, m, n, o, p, r, s, ŝ, t, u
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
